channel.title: Sqls on Barlowe Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Sqls on Barlowe Analytics

item.title: Install
item.description: by Matthew Barlowe This tutorial will cover the basics of getting PostgreSQL setup on your computer and running. We won’t actually be working with data in this article, but instead the focus is on the nuts and bolts of what PostgreSQL is and and its structure. But before I get into all that let’s start at the beginning. As always these tutorials will be focused on working in a Mac OS X environment.
